# [Interview #809: A Feast of Fantasy Interview, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=809#4)

#### Sabrina Fish

What is your favorite part of
*The Alloy of Law*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I would say my favorite part was getting to finally write about interactions between guns and Allomancy.
